hooks.command: FILE_PATH=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); if echo "$FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ex|exs)$'; then mix format "$FILE_PATH"; fi
FILE_PATH=$(jq -r '.tool_input.file_path'); if echo "$FILE_PATH" | grep -qE '\.(ex|exs)$'; then mix compile --warnings-as-errors 2>&1 | head -50; fi

COMMAND=$(jq -r '.tool_input.command'); if echo "$COMMAND" | grep -q 'git commit'; then if ! (mix format --check-formatted && mix compile --warnings-as-errors && mix deps.unlock --check-unused); then exit 2; fi; fi
